Posts.Content: May 7, 2016 10:36AM bonnie-from-pittsburgh01 wrote: I am interested in the lawsuit. I was never told that there could be a risk of permanent hair loss. I had taxotere in 2006 and suffered whole body hair loss that never returned. I went back to all my doctors begging for help and not one ever mentioned taxotere as a possible cause. I am worried about the statute of limitations. Who are the lawyers?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: May 7, 2016 10:00AM bonnie-from-pittsburgh01 wrote: I received taxotere in 2006 and have permanent whole body hair loss. I had my eyebrows tattooed on but my bald head is a devastating loss to deal with every day. I would never take taxotere again. There are safer more effective drugs out there.
